title: Header breadcrumb - page
custom_preconds: GIVEN that breadcrumb appears in the header
custom_steps: WHEN user is on the Home page, then the page section of the breadcrumb reads Home
custom_expected:
AND page section of the breadcrumb changes with navigation to Departments, Apps, Directory, Calendar, Events, Spaces

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19816)

title: Filter function: open
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Global Directory page
AND filter field has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks anywhere on the filter field
custom_expected:
THEN dropdown menu appears
AND it looks like the photo below
AND it has a scroll bar
AND top item reads: All departments

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19847)

title: View More button
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on the Global Directory page
custom_expected:
THEN a button labeled View More is at the bottom of the page

AND WHEN user clicks the button
THEN 8 more contact cards appear.

title: Filter function: click or tap
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on Global Directory page
AND user has clicked or tapped on Filter dropdown box
AND dropdown menu has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on any menu item (except All Departments)
custom_expected:
THEN Filter dropdown menu disappears
AND Filter dropdown box shows the selected department name
AND grid of contact boxes disappears
AND a new grid of contact boxes appears
AND all employees in the new grid are in the department that was selected
AND no employee from another department appears in the new grid

title: Global Events - filter
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Global Events page
AND user is on the All or Archive tab
AND there are more than one event visible
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks on the Filter field
AND user types into the field
custom_expected: THEN only the event cards appear for events that have the sequence of typed characters in their titles.

title: Create Event form - Cancel button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has clicked or tapped on the Create Event button
AND the Create Event form has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the Cancel button
custom_expected: THEN the form disappears

title: Event page - Side nav - Attendees
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on an event page
AND user was the creator of that event
AND the side nav has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the Attendees option in the side nav
custom_expected: THEN the event's Attendees page loads

title: Event page - Side Nav - Codes
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on an event page
AND user was the creator of that event
AND the side nav has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the Codes option in the side nav
custom_expected: THEN the event's page to generate Codes appears.

title: Event page - Side nav - Welcome
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on an event page
AND user was the creator of that event
AND the side nav has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the Welcome option in the side nav
custom_expected: THEN the event's Welcome page loads.

title: Event page - Overview - hover menu
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on an individual event page
custom_steps:
WHEN user hovers cursor over the Overview header
OR user hovers cursor over the description
custom_expected:
THEN a nav bar appears, labeled: Web Content Display
AND at the right in the nav bar is a plus icon (+) and a 3-dot dropdown link

title: Event page - Add Overview description
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on an Event page
AND user is the owner who created that Event
AND directions have appeared beneath the Overview header
AND user has tapped or hovered over the directions text
AND the Web Content Display menu has appeared
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks or taps on the plus sign in the Web Content Display menu
AND a popup with 3 items appears
AND user clicks or taps on the item: Simple Event Overview Structure
custom_expected:
THEN the New Simple Event Overview Structure modal appears

AND WHEN user adds text to the Title field
AND user adds text to the Event Overview field
AND user selects Publish
THEN the modal disappears
AND on the Event page, beneath the Overview header, the user's text has replaced the directions
AND the new title entered into the modal doesn't appear anywhere (the header shows the same title as before)

title: Event page - Generate code
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is an owner of an event
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to the event's Codes page
AND user enters a Group Name
AND user clicks on Get Code button
AND user clicks on the Save button
custom_expected:
THEN user sees a newly generated code
AND user can copy the code (not in MacFF)

title: Event code enables Create Account form
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that a Dept Owner has created an Event
AND Owner has generated a code
AND Owner has saved that code
custom_steps:
WHEN user has that code
AND user goes to the Login page
AND user clicks on "Create Account"
AND Create Account form appears
AND form is disabled
AND user inputs the code in the Registration Code field
custom_expected:
THEN the form is enabled
AND the Cancel button redirects user to Login Page
AND the "Log in" link redirects user to Login Page
AND (back on the form) all fields must be completed before the form will allow submission
AND user can complete all the fields
AND user can click the Create Account button
AND submission redirects to a message page with a link to login
AND clicking the link logs the user in
AND the landing page is the Event from which the code was generated.

AND this process works the same for a code generated in a Space.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19804)

title: Space Home - Members section - select member
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Department Home page
AND Members section has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on a photo
custom_expected:
THEN page redirects within the same tab to the individual contact page that matches the photo
AND the individual contact page is within the Department Directory
AND the header of the individual contact page is the Department header with the Department nav

title: Global Search for all types of elements
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is on the site
AND Global Search field has appeared
custom_steps:
WHEN user searches for the following elements:
member name
app
event
space
document
message
blog post
bookmark
wiki
custom_expected:
THEN element appears
AND formatting is correct
AND element links to the correct relevant page.

title: Top Nav - Events button - function
custom_preconds: GIVEN that top nav is visible in the header
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks on the Events button
AND user clicks on an event
custom_expected:
THEN user is redirected to that event's page

AND WHEN user clicks on "show more"
THEN user is redirected to the Global Events page.

title: Top Nav - Spaces button - function
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that top nav is visible in the header
AND user clicks on the Spaces button
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on a space in the dropdown menu
custom_expected:
THEN user is redirected to that space's page

AND WHEN user clicks on "show more"
THEN user is redirected to a list of spaces.

title: Space Members - only Space participants
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on a Space's Members page
custom_expected:
THEN only participants in that Space appear in the contacts
AND employees outside that Space do not appear

title: Space Members - View More button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Space Members page
AND there are more than 8 contacts in the department
AND the View More button appears at the bottom
custom_steps: WHEN user selects the View More button
custom_expected: THEN 8 more contact cards appear on the page

title: Message Page - breadcrumb function
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Message page
AND breadcrumb has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the Message Board label
custom_expected: THEN page redirects within the same tab to the Space's Message Board.

title: Message Page - edit
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is an Owner in a Space
AND user is on that Space's Message Board
OR user is on an individual message page within that Space
AND user clicks or taps on the 3-dot dropdown of the message
AND the dropdown menu appears
custom_steps: WHEN user selects the Edit option
custom_expected:
THEN the page redirects within the same tab to the Edit Message page
AND the Edit Message page looks like the Add Message page
AND the Edit Message page is pre-populated with data

title: Message Page - edit - publish
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is an Owner in a Space
AND user clicked or tapped on Edit from a message's 3-dot dropdown menu
AND the page redirected within the same tab to the pre-populated Edit Message page
custom_steps:
WHEN user changes any information on the Edit Message page
AND user selects Publish
custom_expected:
THEN page redirects within the same tab to the individual message page
AND the page shows the changes that were made

title: Message Page - Participants cannot modify
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is a participant in a Space but not an owner
AND user is on that Space's Message Board
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the 3-dot dropdown of a message in that Department
custom_expected:
THEN the Edit item does not appear in the dropdown menu
AND Move to Recycle Bin is not an option in the menu

AND WHEN user selects the message
AND page redirects to the message's individual page
AND user clicks or taps on the 3-dot dropdown
THEN the Edit item does not appear in the dropdown menu
AND Move to Recycle Bin is not an option in the menu

title: Message Page - reply
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a message page
AND the 3-dot dropdown has appeared in the header box
AND user has opened the dropdown menu
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on Reply
custom_expected:
THEN the page redirects within the same tab to the Reply to [message title] page 
AND the page looks like the Add Message page
AND the page is populated with relevant data.

title: Message Page - reply with quote
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a message page
AND the 3-dot dropdown has appeared in the header box
AND user has opened the dropdown menu
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on Reply with Quote
custom_expected:
THEN the page redirects within the same tab to the Reply to [message title] page 
AND the page is similar to the Add Message page
AND the page is populated with relevant data
AND the Body contains a gray bar with quotation mark icons and a label: [user's name]: [message title]

title: Message Page - quick reply
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a message page
AND 3-dot dropdown has appeared in the header box
AND user has opened the dropdown menu
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on Quick Reply
custom_expected:
THEN a white box appears beneath the Reply to Main Thread button
AND a header above the white box reads: Quick Reply
AND user can type a reply in the white box
AND these options are not visible: Attachments, Categorization, Related Assets, More Settings
AND Publish and Cancel buttons appear beneath the edit white box

title: Message Page - Reply to Main Thread Button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a message page
AND the Reply to Main Thread button has appeared at the bottom of the page
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the Reply to Main Thread button
custom_expected:
THEN the page redirects within the same tab to the Reply to [message title] page 
AND the page is similar to the Add Message page
AND the page is populated with relevant data

title: Message Page - Reply Publish button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is creating a Reply, Reply with Quote, Quick Reply, or Reply via the button
AND the reply page displays the Publish button
custom_steps:
WHEN user enters text in the reply field
AND user clicks or taps on the Publish button
custom_expected:
THEN page returns to the message page
AND a reply box appears below the message box
AND it looks like the photo below

title: Message Page - Reply - Space Home page
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user has replied to a message
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Space Home page that housed the original message
custom_expected: THEN the Message Board section on the Space Home page shows a new entry: RE: [message title] by [user's name]

title: Message Board - Recycling Bin popup
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is an Owner in a Space
AND user is on that Space's Message Board
AND user has selected a message's 3-dot dropdown
AND dropdown menu has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user selects the item: Move to the Recycle Bin
custom_expected:
THEN the message disappears from the table of messages
AND a popup appears that offers an Undo option

title: Message Board - Recycling Bin popup - Undo
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is an Owner in a Space
AND user is on that Space's Message Board
AND user has sent a message to the Recycling Bin
AND the Recycling Bin popup has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps the Undo button
custom_expected: THEN the message reappears in the table of messages

title: Message Board appearance for non-owner
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Space's Message Board
AND user is not an owner of the Space
custom_expected:
THEN the Banned Users option in the top nav is not visible
AND the Permissions button is not visible

title: Message Board Search field - function
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Space Message Board
AND Search field has appeared
custom_steps:
WHEN user types a whole word in the Search field
OR user types a partial word in the field
AND user hits Enter/Go/Return
custom_expected:
THEN a new header appears that reads: Search
AND the typed characters remain in the Search field
AND the table of messages changes to show a new set of messages
AND the titles of the messages contain the sequence of characters that were typed
AND items are not duped

title: Message Board - select message
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Space's Message Board
AND table of messages has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on a message title
custom_expected: THEN page redirects within the same tab to the message page that matches the selected title

custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the Post New Thread button
custom_expected: THEN page redirects within the same tab to the Add Message page

custom_steps:

AND user clicks or taps on the Publish button
custom_expected:
THEN page redirects to a message page

custom_steps: WHEN user publishes the new message
custom_expected:

AND the document appears on the Space Home page in the Message Board section
AND permissions rules apply (see other test cases).

custom_expected:

title: Message Board - Permissions function
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is an Owner in a Space

custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on Permissions
custom_expected:

AND user can select or de-select checkboxes

title: Message Board - Permissions - Public
custom_preconds:

AND user is on that Space's Message Board
AND user has selected a message's 3-dot dropdown link
AND user has selected the Permissions option
AND the Permissions popup has appeared
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects View for Guest
AND user navigates back to the Message Board
custom_expected: THEN users who are not members of the Department can see the message

custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is an Owner in a Department
AND user is on that Department's Message Board
AND user has selected a message's 3-dot dropdown link
AND user has selected the Permissions option
AND the Permissions popup has appeared
custom_steps:

custom_expected: THEN users who are not members of the Department cannot see it

title: AS OWNER - Space Documents - add folder
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Space Documents page
AND user is an Owner within that Space
AND plus button has appeared
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects the plus button
AND user selects Add Folder
custom_expected:
THEN page redirects within the same tab to the New Folder page
AND user has the following options while creating a documents folder:
- Name (the title, required)
- Description
- Permissions (Viewable by Anyone, Site Members)
AND at the bottom are 2 buttons: Save, Cancel

title: AS OWNER - Space Documents - add folder - Save
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is creating a new documents folder
AND the New Folder page displays the Save button
custom_steps:
WHEN user enters a name/title
AND user clicks or taps on the Save button
custom_expected:
THEN page redirects to the Space Documents page
AND the new folder appears in the table
AND the new folder displays all of the information that the user entered

title: Space Documents - Permissions: Public document
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that an Owner in a Department has created a document
AND Owner set the Viewable permission to "Anyone"
custom_expected:
THEN a user who is NOT a member of the Department can see and open the document
AND a user who IS a member of the Department can see and open the document

AND these rules apply to the document's visibility on the Department Home page as well as the Department Documents page.

title: Space Documents - Permissions: Dept Only document
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that an Owner in a Department has created a document
AND Owner set the Viewable permission to "Site Members"
custom_expected:
THEN a user who is NOT a member of the Department can NOT see and open the document
AND a user who IS a member of the Department CAN see and open the document

AND these rules apply to the document's visibility on the Department Home page as well as the Department Documents page.

title: Space Documents - Permissions: Public folder
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that an Owner in a Department has created a document folder
AND Owner set the Viewable permission to "Anyone"
custom_expected:
THEN a user who is NOT a member of the Department can see and select the document folder
AND a user who IS a member of the Department can see and select the document folder.

title: Space Documents - Permissions: Dept Only folder
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that an Owner in a Department has created a document folder
AND Owner set the Viewable permission to "Site Members"
custom_expected:
THEN a user who is NOT a member of the Department can NOT see and select the document folder
AND a user who IS a member of the Department CAN see and select the document folder.

custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the Space in the breadcrumb

title: Calendar view buttons
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Space Calendar page
AND three buttons have appeared in the header on the right side of the screen: Day, Week, Month
custom_steps: WHEN user taps or clicks on one of those buttons
custom_expected: THEN the calendar display changes according to the selection

title: Calendar nav buttons
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Space Calendar page
AND 3 buttons have appeared to the left in the header: left arrow, Today, right arrow
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on any of those 3 buttons
custom_expected:
THEN the calendar navigates appropriately:
left arrow shows previous days
right arrow shows future days
Today shows right now

title: Calendar: select event
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on a Space Calendar
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the title of an event
custom_expected: THEN page redirects within the same tab to the selected event's individual page

title: Space Blog page - New Post button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on a Space Blog page
AND user is an Owner within that Space
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the New Post button
custom_expected:
THEN the page redirects to the page that shows the Add Blog Entry button

AND WHEN the user clicks that button
THEN page redirects to the Add Post modal

title: New Blog Post - publish
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is creating a new blog post
AND the Add Post page displays the Publish button
custom_steps:
WHEN user makes entries in all required fields
AND user clicks or taps on the Publish button
custom_expected:
THEN page redirects to that Space Blog page with all the blog posts visible
AND the newly created post appears
AND all of the information is what the user entered

title: New Blog Post - different locations
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user has opened an Add Blog Post modal
custom_steps: WHEN user publishes a new Blog Post
custom_expected:
THEN the post appears on the Space Blog page
AND the post appears on the Space Home page under Latest Blog Posts

title: New Blog Post - image
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is an Owner in a Space
AND user is creating a new Blog Post
AND the Add Post modal is open
custom_steps:
WHEN user uploads an image
AND user completes the rest of the new post
AND user selects Publish
custom_expected:
THEN the new post image is not stretched or squished on the individual post page
AND the new post image is not stretched or squished on the Space Blog page
AND the new post image is not stretched or squished on the Space Home page under Latest Blog Posts

title: New Blog Post - start time
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is an Owner in a Space
AND user is creating a new Blog Post
AND the Add Post modal is open
custom_steps:
WHEN user changes the Display Date and/or time
AND user completes the rest of the new post
AND user selects Publish
custom_expected:
THEN at the selected day/time the post will appear on the Space Blog page
AND the post will appear on the Space Home page

title: Space Blog page - filter function
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on a Space Blog page
custom_steps:
WHEN user types a whole word in the Search field
OR user types a partial word in the field
custom_expected:
THEN the page displays only those blog posts which contain the sequence of typed characters
AND items are not duped
AND the characters remain in the Search field

title: Blog Post breadcrumb
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on an individual blog post
AND at the top of the page, above the white box, is a red button with a white left-facing carat
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the red button
custom_expected: THEN page redirects within the same tab to the Space Blog page

title: Blog Post page - edit
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is an Owner in a Space
AND user is on an individual Blog Post page
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the Edit button
custom_expected:
THEN the Edit Post modal appears
AND it looks like the Add Post modal
AND the modal is pre-populated with all the data entered when the chatter was created
AND the Permissions section is not visible
AND user can change or add information and select Publish
AND the post will show the changes.

title: Blog Post page - only Owner can modify
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is a member of a Space
AND user is on a blog post's individual page in that Space 
AND user was not a creator of that post
custom_expected: THEN user does not see the Edit or Delete buttons.

title: Blog Post page - delete
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is an Owner in a Space
AND user is on an individual Blog Post page
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the Delete button
custom_expected:
THEN page redirects within the same tab to the Space Blog page
AND the deleted post is not visible on it
AND the post has disappeared from the Space Home page 
AND the post's individual page is not available to be viewed

title: Event page - Side nav - Attendees
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on an event page
AND user was the creator of that event
AND the side nav has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the Attendees option in the side nav
custom_expected: THEN the event's Attendees page loads

title: Event page - Side Nav - Codes
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on an event page
AND user was the creator of that event
AND the side nav has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the Codes option in the side nav
custom_expected: THEN the event's page to generate Codes appears.

title: Event page - Side nav - Welcome
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on an event page
AND user was the creator of that event
AND the side nav has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the Welcome option in the side nav
custom_expected: THEN the event's Welcome page loads.

title: Event page - Edit Event
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on an individual event page
AND the user is the event owner
AND the Edit Event Details button has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the Edit button
custom_expected:
THEN the same modal as the Create Event modal pops up
AND the modal is correctly pre-populated with the previously entered information [especially check start and end dates, start and end times]
AND user can change or add information 
AND user can click or tap on the Edit Event Details button
AND the new details that they entered are saved
AND the new details replace previous values on the individual event page

title: Event page - event updates in all locations
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on an individual event page
AND user is the owner of that event
custom_steps: WHEN user successfully updates the event's dates or times
custom_expected:
THEN any change the user just made appears on Space Events page
AND changes appear in the event on the Space Calendar

title: Event page - Overview - hover menu
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on an individual event page
custom_steps:
WHEN user hovers cursor over the Overview header
OR user hovers cursor over the description
custom_expected:
THEN a nav bar appears, labeled: Web Content Display
AND at the right in the nav bar is a plus icon (+) and a 3-dot dropdown link

title: Event page - Add Overview description
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on an Event page
AND user is the owner who created that Event
AND directions have appeared beneath the Overview header
AND user has tapped or hovered over the directions text
AND the Web Content Display menu has appeared
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks or taps on the plus sign in the Web Content Display menu
AND a popup with 3 items appears
AND user clicks or taps on the item: Simple Event Overview Structure
custom_expected:
THEN the New Simple Event Overview Structure modal appears

AND WHEN user adds text to the Title field
AND user adds text to the Event Overview field
AND user selects Publish
THEN the modal disappears
AND on the Event page, beneath the Overview header, the user's text has replaced the directions
AND the new title entered into the modal doesn't appear anywhere (the header shows the same title as before)

title: Event page - Attendees chart
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on an event page
AND user did not create the event
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks or taps on the "I will attend" button

AND WHEN user logs out and logs back in as the creator of the event
AND user navigates to that event page
AND user clicks or taps on Attendees in the toggle
AND the Attendees chart appears
custom_expected:
THEN the non-creator user's name appears in a row in the chart
AND all of the non-creator user's information is correct.

title: Event page - Generate code
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is an owner of an event
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to the event's Codes page
AND user enters a Group Name
AND user clicks on Get Code button
AND user clicks on the Save button
custom_expected:
THEN user sees a newly generated code
AND user can copy the code (not in MacFF)

title: Event code enables Create Account form
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that a Space Owner has created an Event
AND Owner has generated a code
AND Owner has saved that code
custom_steps:
WHEN user has that code
AND user goes to the Login page
AND user clicks on "Create Account"
AND Create Account form appears
AND form is disabled
AND user inputs the code in the Registration Code field
custom_expected:
THEN the form is enabled
AND the Cancel button redirects user to Login Page
AND the "Log in" link redirects user to Login Page
AND (back on the form) all fields must be completed before the form will allow submission
AND user can complete all the fields
AND user can click the Create Account button
AND submission redirects to a message page with a link to login
AND clicking the link logs the user in
AND the landing page is the Event from which the code was generated.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19804)

title: Event page - Delete Event - popup
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on an individual event page
AND is the event owner
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the Delete button
custom_expected:
THEN a popup appears
AND it looks like the photo below

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19864)

title: Event page - Delete Event - popup "Yes"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on an individual event page
AND user has selected the Delete Event button
AND the delete popup has appeared
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks or taps on the "Yes" button
AND user navigates to the Global Events page
custom_expected:
THEN the event no longer appears in the grid of events

AND WHEN user navigates to the Global Calendar page
THEN the event no longer appears on the calendar

AND WHEN user navigates to the Main Page
IF the event was a Featured Event
THEN it no longer appears at the top of the page.

custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on a Space's Wiki page
custom_steps: WHEN user selects the Space name in the breadcrumb
custom_expected: THEN page redirects to the Space Home page.

custom_steps:
WHEN user types in the Search field
AND user hits Enter/Return
custom_expected:
THEN page presents the search results that match the typed phrase
AND the results look like the photo below
AND user can click on a result
AND page will redirect to the relevant wiki page.
